languages.text:
Встречен достойно был каждый суровый удар,
Яро казнен был каждый опасный противник!"

With dignity was met
each brutal strike,
and with savagery was slain
each deadly foe!"
languages.original_text:
Встречен достойно был каждый суровый удар,
Яро казнен был каждый опасный противник!"

traits.locale_text:
With dignity was met
each brutal strike,
and with savagery was slain
each deadly foe!"

With dignity was met
each brutal strike,
and with savagery was slain
each deadly foe!"

Встречен достойно был каждый суровый удар,
Яро казнен был каждый опасный противник!"

With dignity was met
each brutal strike,
and with savagery was slain
each deadly foe!"

languages.text:
残忍な一撃を加えるごとに
尊厳を取り戻し
蛮勇をもって
恐ろしい敵を次々と打ち倒した！」
languages.original_text:
With dignity was met
each brutal strike,
and with savagery was slain
each deadly foe!"

traits.locale_text:
残忍な一撃を加えるごとに
尊厳を取り戻し
蛮勇をもって
恐ろしい敵を次々と打ち倒した！」

languages.text:
“以尊严迎战，
每一次残酷的攻击。
以残忍回敬，
每一个危险的敌人！”
languages.original_text:
With dignity was met
each brutal strike,
and with savagery was slain
each deadly foe!"

traits.locale_text:
“以尊严迎战，
每一次残酷的攻击。
以残忍回敬，
每一个危险的敌人！”

languages.text:
« Avec grande dignité
chaque coup fut accueilli,
et avec sauvagerie
chaque ennemi fut occis ! »
languages.original_text:
With dignity was met
each brutal strike,
and with savagery was slain
each deadly foe!"

traits.locale_text:
« Avec grande dignité
chaque coup fut accueilli,
et avec sauvagerie
chaque ennemi fut occis ! »

languages.text:
«¡Con dignidad era recibido
cada impacto despiadado,
y con salvajismo fue destruido
cada enemigo desalmado!».
languages.original_text:
With dignity was met
each brutal strike,
and with savagery was slain
each deadly foe!"

traits.locale_text:
«¡Con dignidad era recibido
cada impacto despiadado,
y con salvajismo fue destruido
cada enemigo desalmado!».

languages.text:
Mit Würde wurde
jeder brutale Schlag hingenommen,
und mit Wut wurde
jeder tödliche Feind gerichtet!"
languages.original_text:
With dignity was met
each brutal strike,
and with savagery was slain
each deadly foe!"

traits.locale_text:
Mit Würde wurde
jeder brutale Schlag hingenommen,
und mit Wut wurde
jeder tödliche Feind gerichtet!"

languages.text:
Tüm ölümcül saldırıları
Şerefle karşıladı.
Tüm ölümcül düşmanları
Amansızca katletti!"
languages.original_text:
With dignity was met
each brutal strike,
and with savagery was slain
each deadly foe!"

traits.locale_text:
Tüm ölümcül saldırıları
şerefle karşıladı.
Tüm ölümcül düşmanları
katletti acımasızca!"
